State 1.Name: Deposit State
State 1.Description: When users deposit Ether using the fallback function or the Deposit function.

State 2.Name: Withdrawal State
State 2.Description: When users or the owner withdraw tokens or Ether using WitdrawTokenToHolder or WithdrawToHolder.

Interaction 1.Description: The contract interacts with external token contracts using the WithdrawToken function, calling the 'transfer' method.

Interaction 2.Description: Ether is transferred back to users when WithdrawToHolder is called.
